strength_details: Modern data warehouse technology (Snowflake) with strong optimization focus
Established enterprise company (IBM) with stable consulting business
Focused data integration role with clear technical boundaries
concern_details: No salary, benefits, or compensation information disclosed
No career growth, learning opportunities, or advancement paths mentioned
Must be located in Pune, India - no remote work options
No visa sponsorship mentioned, India work authorization required
best_fit_details: Mid-level data engineers with 3-6 years experience in ETL and data warehousing
Engineers with Talend and Snowflake experience seeking stable consulting work
Candidates comfortable with traditional enterprise data integration patterns
probe_details: Ask about salary range, benefits, and total compensation package
Understand team structure, reporting, and collaboration model
Clarify career advancement opportunities within IBM consulting
Discuss typical work hours and project delivery expectations
leverage_details: Strong Talend and Snowflake experience is exact match for requirements
Already located in Pune, India eliminates relocation concerns
summary.overall_assessment: Solid data engineering role at established company with modern tech stack, but lacks growth opportunities and transparency around compensation. Best fit for mid-level engineers seeking stable consulting work in Pune with specific Snowflake/Talend expertise.
